long description of Other Mini Widgets
Catalog1 Search Products - only products in this category will show up in a search in catalog1
For quick orders, you have found the right place!

ProductCategoryLink.detailText: The LGPL license may be more restrictive than you would like, but we think you will like the gizmo anyway!
If you cannot find the gizmo you want here, try it on Google.

Product.longDescription: This gizmo is very small and runs on solar power.
This is the original multi-colored gizmo, only available from OFBiz!

This gizmo only works in certain areas and requires a lot of extra space to move around.

It is not recommended for mission critical applications or those with a low tolerance for pain and frustration.

ElectronicText.textData: *** WARNING: this gizmo is known to crash quite often and may malfunction or cease to function due to malicious misuse of certain features ***

Product.longDescription: Highest quality gizmo around.
Highest quality gizmo around.
Highest quality gizmo around.
Highest quality gizmo around.
Highest quality gizmo around.
A small round gizmo with multi-colored lights. Works great in the dark. Small and compact.
A large gizmo with legs. Walks on its own. Does not require a power supply.
The his/her gizmo is a perfect gift for your favorite couple. Once you try it out you'll want a set for yourself!
This micro chrome widget makes a perfect gift. This one is so small that it floats in air.
This tiny chrome widget makes a perfect gift. The shine will last forever. No pollishing required.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item especially as it can have (almost) as many variants as you like

Product.description: A 1 month subscription to the Gizmo Newsletter: can be used immediately after purchase.
Product.longDescription: This newsletter will give you regular updates on the wonderful world of Gizmos!

Product.description: A digital gizmo: can be downloaded immediately after purchase.
Product.longDescription: This gizmo is part of an exciting new breed that needs no corporeal form: it is all digital! Buy and download it now!

Content.description: Image of Digital Gizmo (actually the OFBiz logo)

Product.description: Auto-Assembled Gizmo Basket. Automatically assembled each time it's ordered.
Product.longDescription: Auto-Assembled Gizmo Basket. This item will be automatically assembled with production runs every time it's ordered, and the inventory counts for it are based on the quantity available and on hand for the component items.

Product.description: Assembled Pick Gizmo Basket. Assembled during picking.
Product.longDescription: Assembled Pick Gizmo Basket. This item will be assembled during picking.

Product.description: Service type product for demonstration use

ProductAssoc.reason: A little bit more expensive, but worth every penny!
If you like chrome, but want it a little bigger, this is the one for you!
A whole lot more features for the buck.
These two are much more useful together.
These two are much more useful together.
This makes it look much better.

This makes it look much better.
The Giant Widget is much better than the Big Gizmo, so much so that it makes the Big Gizmo obsolete.

ProductCategoryMember.comments: The Open Gizmo is compatibile with all other gimzos.
Despite its low price, the Open Gizmo is quite large and powerful.

ProductPromo.promoText: Spend more than $100 on your favorite widgets and gizmos and get a free Micro Chrome Widget!
20% off any one item, either GZ-1005 (.NIT Gizmo) or GZ-1006 (Open Gizmo) with a limit of 1 per order

ProductPromo.promoName: Test percent off entire purchase, no condition

ProductPromo.promoText: $10 off entire purchase of $50 or more with promo code [9000], limit use of code to one per customer, limit for three uses total for the code

ProductPromo.promoName: Test buy X get Y free
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy 3 Get 2 Free in the Widgets [200] or any sub-category (except the Small Widgets [201] category and sub-categories, but always including the Micro Widgets [20111] category), limit to two per order

ProductPromo.promoName: Test buy X get Y at Z% discount
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy 1 Big Gizmo [GZ-8544] or Massive Gizmo [GZ-7000] Get 1 Purple Gizmo [GZ-5005] At 50% off with promo code [9001] (must be associated with Party or Email), no limit
Buy 4 items for $50 from Purple Gizmo [GZ-5005], Rainbow Gizmo [GZ-1004], Round Gizmo [GZ-2644] or Square Gizmo [GZ-2002] limit 2 per customer
Get $500 off any item in the Small Gizmos [101] category, limit 1 per order, 2 per customer, 3 for entire promotion. Discount not to exceed the price of the item.

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Gift with Amount of Specific Product
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy $50 of your favorite gizmos (all products in Gizmo [100] or sub-category) get a free Open Gizmo! Limit 2 per order.

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Gift with Total Amount of Product
ProductPromo.promoText: Spend more than $150 on your favorite gizmos (all products in Gizmo [100] or sub-category) and get a free Open Gizmo!

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Percent off when Customer Orders over $1000 in 12 months
ProductPromo.promoText: Spend more than $1000 in any 12 months on our fabulous Widgets and Gizmos and get a 5% discount.

ProductPromoRule.ruleName: GWP for Gizmos Only Not Counted
Percent off for Ordered Sub-Total History

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Products for Special Promo Price
ProductPromo.promoText: With special code [9021] get products in the Featured Products category for their special promotion price.
